verses.verse: Now [this] was the lot<WH1486> for the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh,<WH4519> for he was the first-born of Joseph.<WH3130> To Machir<WH4353> the first-born of Manasseh,<WH4519> the father of Gilead,<WH1> was allotted<WH1568> Gilead<WH1961> and Bashan,<WH1568> because<WH1316> he was a man<WH3588> of war.<WH376>

So [the lot] was [made] for the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> according to their families:<WH4940> for the sons<WH1121> of Abiezer<WH44> and for the sons<WH1121> of Helek<WH2507> and for the sons<WH1121> of Asriel<WH844> and for the sons<WH1121> of Shechem<WH7928> and for the sons<WH1121> of Hepher<WH2660> and for the sons<WH1121> of Shemida;<WH8061> these<WH428> [were] the male<WH2145> [descendants] of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> according to their families.<WH4940>

However, Zelophehad,<WH6765> the son<WH1121> of Hepher,<WH2660> the son<WH1121> of Gilead,<WH1568> the son<WH1121> of Machir,<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> had<WH1961> no<WH3808> sons,<WH1121> only<WH3588> <WH518> daughters;<WH1323> and these<WH428> are the names<WH8034> of his daughters:<WH1323> Mahlah<WH4244> and Noah,<WH5270> Hoglah,<WH2295> Milcah<WH4435> and Tirzah.<WH8656>

And they came<WH7126> near<WH7126> before<WH6440> Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> and before<WH6440> Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126> and before<WH6440> the leaders,<WH5387> saying,<WH559> "The Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> to give<WH5414> us an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> our brothers.<WH251>" So according<WH413> to the command<WH6310> of the Lord<WH3068> he gave<WH5414> them an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> their father's brothers.<WH251>

Thus there fell<WH5307> ten<WH6235> portions<WH9112> to Manasseh,<WH4519> besides<WH905> <WH4480> the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> and Bashan,<WH1316> which<WH834> is beyond<WH4480> <WH5676> the Jordan,<WH3383>

because<WH3588> the daughters<WH1323> of Manasseh<WH4519> received<WH5157> an inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> his sons.<WH1121> And the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> belonged<WH1961> to the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh.<WH4519>

And the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> ran<WH1961> from Asher<WH836> to Michmethath<WH4366> which<WH834> was east<WH5921> <WH6440> of Shechem;<WH7927> then the border<WH1366> went<WH1980> southward<WH3225> to the inhabitants<WH3427> of En-tappuah.
The land<WH776> of Tappuah<WH8599> belonged<WH1961> to Manasseh,<WH4519> but Tappuah<WH8599> on the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> [belonged] to the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim.<WH669>

And the border<WH1366> went<WH3381> down<WH3381> to the brook<WH5158> of Kanah,<WH7071> southward<WH5045> of the brook<WH5158> (these<WH428> cities<WH5892> [belonged] to Ephraim<WH669> among<WH8432> the cities<WH5892> of Manasseh<WH4519>), and the border<WH1366> of Manasseh<WH4519> [was] on the north<WH6828> side<WH6828> of the brook,<WH5158> and it ended<WH1961> <WH8444> at the sea.<WH3220>

The south<WH5045> side<WH5045> [belonged] to Ephraim<WH669> and the north<WH6828> side<WH6828> to Manasseh,<WH4519> and the sea<WH3220> was their border;<WH1366> and they reached<WH6293> to Asher<WH836> on the north<WH6828> and to Issachar<WH3485> on the east.<WH4217>

And in Issachar<WH3485> and in Asher,<WH836> Manasseh<WH4519> had<WH1961> Beth-shean and its towns<WH1323> and Ibleam<WH2991> and its towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Dor<WH1756> and its towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of En-dor and its towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Taanach<WH8590> and its towns,<WH1323> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Megiddo<WH4023> and its towns,<WH1323> the third<WH7969> is Napheth.<WH5316>

But the sons<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> could<WH3201> not take<WH3423> possession<WH3423> of these<WH428> cities,<WH5892> because the Canaanites<WH3669> persisted<WH2974> in living<WH3427> in that land.<WH776>

And it came<WH1961> about when<WH3588> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> became<WH2388> strong,<WH2388> they put<WH5414> the Canaanites<WH3669> to forced<WH4522> labor,<WH4522> but they did not drive<WH3423> them out completely.<WH3423>

Then the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> spoke<WH1696> to Joshua,<WH3091> saying,<WH559> "Why<WH4069> have you given<WH5414> me only one<WH259> lot<WH1486> and one<WH259> portion<WH9112> for an inheritance,<WH5159> since I am a numerous<WH7227> people<WH5971> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has thus<WH3541> far<WH5704> blessed<WH1288>?"

And Joshua<WH3091> said<WH559> to them, "If<WH518> you are a numerous<WH7227> people,<WH5971> go<WH5927> up to the forest<WH9194> and clear<WH1254> a place for yourself there<WH8033> in the land<WH776> of the Perizzites<WH6522> and of the Rephaim,<WH7497> since<WH3588> the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> of Ephraim<WH669> is too narrow<WH213> for you."

And the sons<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> said,<WH559> "The hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> is not enough<WH4672> for us, and all<WH3605> the Canaanites<WH3669> who live<WH3427> in the valley<WH6010> land<WH776> have chariots<WH7393> of iron,<WH1270> both those who<WH834> are in Beth-shean and its towns,<WH1323> and those who<WH834> are in the valley<WH6010> of Jezreel.<WH3157>"

And Joshua<WH3091> spoke<WH559> to the house<WH1004> of Joseph,<WH3130> to Ephraim<WH669> and Manasseh,<WH4519> saying,<WH559> "You are a numerous<WH7227> people<WH5971> and have great<WH1419> power;<WH3581> you shall not have<WH1961> one<WH259> lot<WH1486> [only,]

but the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> shall be yours. For though it is a forest,<WH9194> you shall clear<WH1254> it, and to its farthest<WH8444> borders<WH8444> it shall be yours; for you shall drive<WH3423> out the Canaanites,<WH3669> even<WH3588> though<WH3588> they have chariots<WH7393> of iron<WH1270> [and] though<WH3588> they are strong.<WH2389> "
